title: Dudes
description: Chicago’s hottest dating show where the hunk who gets the most kisses wins a romantic trip to Hawaii.
quote: Let’s meet the three dudes who are vying for the title of Super Dude.
alt1: the host with three single ladies
alt2: the host making a face with text on screen: “Wow! Hunk-O-Rama!”
alt3: young lady giving a peace sign
alt4: three hunks with big lips on their clothes
